website_summaries.verdict: A natural cleanser that targets pores with healthy intentions.
pros: Infused with protein and vitamins to clean and minimize pores
Made with egg whites to tighten enlarged pores
Does not strip skin but rather supports its natural balance
cons: Not all will love how it smells

customer_reviews.title: New packaging? What's the deal
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this product. I absolutely loved my first purchase. The bottle looks exactly as pictured and the product was amazing. This time around, the bottle is more sleek, and the picture is different. The product feels more or less the same, but it smells different. Could be placebo from the packaging, but I don't know. I definitely thought the other bottle was cuter. Anyway, I still love the product but want to know what is up with this ugly bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Keeks

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice cleanser. I am always weary about trying new products because my face is easily irritated. I have only used this for 3 days now, morning and at night. I have not had any skin irritation or break out. It does have a stronger scent to it than I expected but it hasn't bothered me nor does it smell bad. So, I am happy with it so far. My skin feels really good after using it in my skin routine and I plan to keep to continue with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but stings!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! I've been using it for a couple months now and my skin looks amazing. I have really large pores on my nose and this has helped tighten them up. I left mine in an AirBnB so am reordering a new one, but the tube is really big and would have otherwise lasted me a couple more months. The only negative thing I have to say is that it stings really bad if you get it in your eyes. Like, REALLY bad. So just be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Audish

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this product as this brand has been good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product as this brand has been good, except for this. After using this, I started to notice my cheeks becoming whiter as they are normally read. I thought I was getting vitiligo... I was scared only to find out it's this product. Not sure what chemicals contribute to this effect, but my skin's PH is messed up and I have white blotches on my skin, nose, cheeks, and my skin was actually good before with the exception of my pores. I would not recommend this product. My skin used to be smooth, but now it looks as if I have acne pits because of the white marks. I am sad.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Deep cleansing
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time buying Skinfood's egg white pore foam because I really like how clean my face feels after using it! I only use this in the evenings after removing my makeup, otherwise I feel it may be a bit too much for the morning. I think it lives up to the "deep cleansing" description. It leaves your pores SUPER CLEAN, and also has that kinda tightening feeling on your skin. I have COMBINATION skin, previously OILY skin, so I think this may feel too drying if you have dry skin. Affordable, and you only need a tiny bit, so it lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Cat.

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser, gets in deep without drying if you use a small amount
customer_reviews.text: When using just a little dollop sized amount on the fingertip, it really gets in there and leaves your face with a sleek, squeaky clean that doesn't leave your skin blotchy, tight or irritated. I use sparingly every night and wash off quickly. If you have sensitive skin please follow my advice and use a pea sized dollop - a little goes a long way. I suspect your face will dry out if you use a quarter sized amount or more unless you have very oily, acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M

customer_reviews.title: I love Skinfood products
customer_reviews.text: OK, I love Skinfood products! I read the reviews on this was excited to try it but was not expecting to see the results as quickly as I did. There was a review that said she saw a difference after the first wash. I was skeptical but willing to try it out. I've used this face wash twice, and I can see a HUGE difference. My nose has blackheads like crazy, well HAD. My pores are so clear, as the blackheads on my nose are almost gone. I absolutely love this product. 💕 I have oily/combo skin with hyper pigmentation and I live in a hot, humid climate.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Noir

customer_reviews.title: It's a great value for the price too
customer_reviews.text: This is my HG face wash! It's a great value for the price too. I use this after removing my makeup with Clean It Zero and then use Son & Park Beauty Water and I've gotten so many compliments on my skin! This foams up pretty well, but also won't sting your eyes or burn your face. I don't know if I'd recommend this as a single wash product (without an oil cleanser) but as part of a two-step cleanser this stuff is great!
customer_reviews.author: aselbea

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell, caused acne
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does have a strong perfumey scent which no natural type face wash should have. The way it looks, smelled and felt reminded me of dove body wash. With most of the tube being in Korean you aren’t able to understand the ingredient list so who knows what you’re really putting on your face. The real kicker for me was that I started having breakouts after starting to incorporate this into my daily skin routine as I looked for a replacement daily cleanser....this was clearly not a good choice for my skin. Threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Drjmcc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I am in my 30s n was struggling with pimples n discoloration on my face. I started using 10 step K products which lowered my acne on my face drastically but i still used to get pimple here and there. I switched my face wash the 2nd step to this product and my face stopped breaking out. Even when i end up with one small pimple its dried up next day. I went to over seas and just took this face wash and moisturizer and my skin still looked great and no breakout. I have combination skin. This produxt removes oil and doesnt dry up my face. Smells great too.
customer_reviews.author: Cutebebe0715

customer_reviews.title: This foam wash does a really good job! It seems like it works better than ...
customer_reviews.text: I have skin that breaks out all the time, it’s a pain. I was trying to find a product that would help keep the oil levels on my face down and at the same time wouldn’t dry it out. This foam wash does a really good job! It seems like it works better than products that are 3x the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I noticed my pores were visibly smaller after just one use. I do notice that my nose is a little more oily than normal, but I attribute that to not wearing my normal powder makeup. This oiliness is also reducing over time (2 weeks of use). Will definitely keep this in my skin care regimen!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Lathers awesome but careful -burns eyes.
customer_reviews.text: This is a thick, white creamy mix that lathers so wonderfully. The lather is thick and creamy itself and feels great. The first couple nights it got in my eyes and does it burn! Rinse your eyes super duper good before opening them! The ingredients are a long list of things I don't know or can pronounce. I like it but question how good it is from the list on the back. Would make an interesting addition to a gift for someone...or an upcoming stocking stuffer. The scent is soft and light. Very pleasing and comforting fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: P.T.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Do far so good. A little goes a long, long way so it's very cost efficient. I'm not sure it is doing what it says yet. I've been using it for a few months but still have little comedones, blackheads and/or sebum plugs on my nose, etc. But I love the texture, scent, and it does not dry my skin out.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha W.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle cleansing
customer_reviews.text: I have oily large pore skin. And its sensitive to boot. My regular face wash is getting discontinued so I took a chance in this-note -I've been stalking it for over a year now but never pulled the trigger. ($10 for facewash?!) So glad I finally did! It cleans without drying my face out much. Its smooth and gentle. I use one of those silicon face scrubbers and I only need a tiny glob-like the size of a dot of glue. This will last forever that way! I have other skin food stuff and this is on point with their other products! Worth. It.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bates

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product out based on some of the positive reviews that I had read and all of the positive press it has gotten. I have normal/combination, acne-prone skin that clogs easily. While this cleanser did make my skin feel really clean, it also overly dried out my skin. It didn't feel great and didn't really get rid of my skin problems. Probably won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly  Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Love it, and I'll keep using it as long ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this twice a day: in the shower in the morning, and as the second step in my oil cleanse at night. It's made a huge difference in my complexion, even when I was using it on its own for a couple months. I have combination skin that errs on the side of oily, and it's been drying without totally drying me out. I had some stubborn acne spots that have really cleared up. Love it, and I'll keep using it as long as I can. A little goes a long way, and one tube has lasted me almost four months already (but I do have a second one waiting in the wings).
customer_reviews.author: elizabethTop Contributor: Korean Beauty Products

customer_reviews.title: You know when you forget to use it.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to write a review because it's been a year since I've started using this and I'm reordering another bottle. Can't say it neutralizes my stubborn blackheads, which I hoped it would, but I will say you KNOW when you forget to use it (Yes, it actually DOES control your pores). I'm too lazy to spare a travel bottle for a second cleanser and whenever I'm away from this my pores go absolutely insane. Bottom line: if you have pores that try to swallow your face like mine, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: sassymain

customer_reviews.title: great results. Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing! One hour after my second use, the black heads were popping up. Ill add an acne treatment until my pores are purged. I'm a 43 year old female who is exposed to alot of dust, pollen, and humidity (southern Indiana weather). My routine changes with our weather. This was a great buy and I immediately suggested it to my sisters.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Conkle

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, feels soft
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleanser, foams easily and I love the smell. Skin feels clean and soft after washing. A little goes a long, long way. I always squeeze a tiny amount and it foams up nicely, this cleanser lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: My new go to cleanser.
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin and this cleanser works great for me. I use it after I remove my makeup with yes to tomatoes gel cleanser. It’s really gentle, and perfectly cleanses without overly stripping my skin. It doesn’t leave my skin squeaky clean, which is great. I’ll be repurchasing once I run out. I don’t use it every day. Maybe 3 times a week. And it’s lasted for months now. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: hailey

customer_reviews.title: I love the product but hate the new price.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this face wash. I have used it for about 4 years now. I don't love how the price went from $9.99 to $48.95!!!!!!!! A $40 difference is ridiculous!!!! I'll give it a 5-star rating if they lower the price back to $9.99 like it used to be....
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love this Skinfood cleanser!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cleansers...my skin looks great and I definitely see a change (for the better) in my pore size. Just a tiny amount cleans so well. My only complaint is it isn't a true all in one cleanser as I don't like using it around my eyes, as it stings a little and doesn't do a good job removing eye make up. I have already bought a second as back up.
customer_reviews.author: Avntgarde

customer_reviews.title: Very Drying
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would help clear out my T-zone, but it’s TOO DRYING for my combo skin. Irritating to my dry cheeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Meadows

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT. AS SOON AS I CAN GET MY COINS IN ORDER (currency conversion is the killer) I AM BUYING THE ENTIRE LINE! You do not have to use a lot of this product so one tube will last months. I like how it brightens the skin. No it's not a skin lightener(I am of African descent and not very dark)but it makes you glow. I have oily skin and large pores. I will check back after a month of continuous use to see the "pore decreasing effect"even though I doubt it will work. I don't hold out much hope that ANY product can decrease these mini craters.
customer_reviews.author: Z. London

customer_reviews.title: SUPER HIGH PH!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the texture of this cleanser, but that's the only good thing about it. It's very drying, even with my oily/combo skin. It has a very high ph of 10! Ph is so important because high ph products destroy your moisture barrier and allow bacteria to enter your skin. Skin is naturally acidic and bacteria cant thrive in acidic environments. Definitely look elsewhere for a good low ph cleanser!
customer_reviews.author: jonathan ward

customer_reviews.title: ... days ago and I have to say it hasn’t disappointed one bit
customer_reviews.text: I just got this product a couple of days ago and I have to say it hasn’t disappointed one bit. I tend to have breakouts right before that time of the month and other times it’s random breakouts. After two days of using this my skin has cleared up drastically. I love that it’s gentle on my skin and a little goes a long way. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! It lathers up so well so it doesn't need to use alot of it. It done exactly what it said it'd do. My pores are minimized alot more than they originally were. I will definitely purchase again when I'm out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So smooth... So nice...
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver! My skin is sooo smooth and my pores are much tighter. This is an integral part of my routine and it is one of my favorite steps to do. I first got a sample size in my etsy bag and I used every last bit of that sucker- this new, big, size is so nice to have. 10/10 I would recommend it (but try to see if you can test it first, it sucks when your skin reacts badly to skincare products).
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! Leaves my face feeling tight and clean, my sister even was amazed by my skin after using this for a week. She just randomly pointed out how smooth and glowing it looked!! Only downside is that it leaves my skin feeling somewhat waxy, as if I washed with a bar of soup. It feels better after drying my face from the cleanser and I follow with a toner that completely removes the feeling. It's just something I noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa Greco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've just ordered my second bottle that's how good this stuff is. It lasted me about 2 months, it worked great for my large pores they are no longer noticeable. I have very oily skin and it helped to minimize that as well. This was a overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this face soap. But not the price increase!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for awhile. I really love how it makes my face feel tight and very clean. But recently went to purchase and the price went from around $12.00 to $40 plus dollars!! So I will not buy unless it lowers back down in price. I will shop around for something similar and more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: KTB

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as promised
customer_reviews.text: I have EXTREMELY sensitive skin. I find that I have more success with Korean skincare products than any other. This does not dry out my skin, as others have said a little goes a LONG WAY, and I can see a noticeable difference in my pores before and after use. I have had the product for about a week and all is well, my face has been clearing up (I am also acne-prone) and this combined with a nature republic Super Aqua Max has made my skin satin-smooth and smell amazing! Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't like this product. I used it only once and it dried my skin out terribly. I should start by saying I don't have sensitive skin. I used Oxy scrubs for years and had no problems. But this product caused my skin to dry, crack and peel. It was like I had a bad sunburn. The skin literally peeled from my nose. I ordered this because of the high ratings. But in good conscience cannot endorse this product. Wish I could get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this a few times and WOW my face feels so clean after each use! It does give you the squeaky clean feeling which I like. I have very large pores and oily skin and after I use this I just feel like my face has tightened and all the gunk from the day is gone. I love that you only neee a tiny bit to achieve a clean feeling. I’ve since ordered the mask to try as well.. can’t wait for it to get here.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of skeptical of trying a beauty product that doesn't really appear to the eye as a beauty product, but it was highly rated and recommended in my monthly ulta ad, and I really wanted something that would clean deep into my pores. I was also skeptical that this product would smell weird because it has egg whites in it. However, it is scented (thank god) and it does clean deep into your pores.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy again!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used so many cleansers and they still manage to leave my nose covered in black heads and I’d get oily in about an hour. After reading all the review I finally decided to try it and and thank you baby Jesus I did!! My mother even noticed the difference and she never gives compliments!! My skin feels soft and my pores are much smaller. I love it and a little goes a long way even my husband uses it from time to time and I love the fragrance it’s not too strong
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: It's great for sensitive skin and acne prone individuals
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this face wash! I dealt with annoying adult acne (looked like contact dermatitis or eczema) around my mouth and T zone. I started using this face wash twice a day once in the morning before makeup and in the evening before bed. My skin has really improved! I don't know if it's solely due to the face wash because I also use a general zinc oxide ointment on my face as well as hydrocolloid bandages for acne. Regardless, I'm happy with this product and it's generally the only face wash I use. It's great for sensitive skin and combination acne prone individuals.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin and my shower caddy is filled with all different kinds of face washes that don't work for me. I bought this because it was different, had good reviews, and I have never seen it in a store. The facewash is great because it fluffs the more you rub it on your face and washes off nicely (no greasy feeling afterwards). It really does minimize pores too, I have noticed. Then I follow-up with face lotion and I'm good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STINKS
customer_reviews.text: Hated it. Insanely strong perfume smell was off putting and it made my skin itchy and irritated. I’ve washed my hands 4 times with regular hand soap and the perfume from this cleanser still won’t come off my hands. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: New Face Who Dis
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff! It makes my skin feel clean without drying it out and my pores are pretty much gone. A friend of mine recommended this and I've been using it about 6 weeks and it's still amazing. No breakouts either. FTW
customer_reviews.author: Samantha K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing foam cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: This foam cleanser is one of the best I've used. I'm on my second tube already and I love it! It leaves my skin feeling extra clean and I love the texture when you smooth it on your face. I have pretty sensitive skin but this facial cleanser hasn't given me any problems. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a new cleanser!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: this would be a very good cleanser for you
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what everyone is raving about with this product, and I wish I did, as I had high hopes for it. It did nothing to minimize my pores, oily skin, or outbreaks. Plus, the egg smell started to get really weird after a couple of weeks of using it. The one redeeming quality is that it is very gentle. If you don't struggle with outbreaks, oily skin, and if you don't wear a lot of makeup, this would be a very good cleanser for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Costa

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I have combination skin (a little on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have combination skin (a little on the oilier side), large pores, and break out literally all the time. This stuff gets down in my pores and cleans them out very well and tightens them back up after rinsing with cold water. It does exactly what it says it does. Now, I must say, I use this with other skin care products in my routine, so I'm sure they help this product work even better. This product is great on its own, but I recommend using with a good toner, exfoliator, vitamin C serum, and moisturizer with SPF 30+.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Andrew-Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I have been using it for a couple of years. I have fairly sensitive skin and this stuff will dry it out, but using a moisturizer right after the shower helps. This stuff leave my skin feeling very clean and has a unique and pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality control needed
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for a little over a year and I love it. However since the new smaller packaging it is not as creamy it's a little runny now. Disappointed I might have to change if the quality is not consistent.
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: skin is super soft, works really well with a double cleansing ...
customer_reviews.text: skin is super soft, works really well with a double cleansing process as the second cleanse. doesn't make your skin feel too dry or tight afterwards. makes my cheeks feel like silk. only con is a weird smell, something similar to eggs but then again..it's an egg white foam. my pores look slightly smaller but mostly just care about how clean my face feels and looks.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: extremely drying, caused peeling and breakouts!
customer_reviews.text: extremely harsh and drying. i have oily skin and have never suffered from dry skin, but after 2 weeks of daily use of this cleanser, my skin started breaking out and actually peeling from dryness like i had a sunburn! this was while using jason's deeply moisturizing ester-c creme, and it still couldn't combat the damage from this product! i've also just learned that the pH of this cleanser is also way too alkaline for the skin at 9.5. i've stopped using the pore foam and gone back to a gentle acure cleanser. i wanted to love this product since i love the peach sake toner, but it really destroyed my skin a very short time frame!
customer_reviews.author: J. Manley

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised at how much I liked this! It rinses nicely
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how much I liked this! It rinses nicely, I always feel like other cleansers leave a residue on my face, but it felt really clean after rinsing. I like the way it makes my skin look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: it will be fine. It hasn't done much to help with the ...
customer_reviews.text: A little warning for those with sensitive skin, it stung a little after using it for the first time. But I learned that you should wet your face with warm water, use this product, rinse with warm water, than splash with cold water, it will be fine. It hasn't done much to help with the pores and it is a little drying but it does leave my face feeling clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nhi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I hope they restock this soon. I love this face wash. I have clear skin, but I do have some enlarged pores. I also have oily skin. This made my skin feel so soft and clean. My pores looked a little smaller. I need to stock up on this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Put this on your Dash Button list for easy ordering!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! The first time I used it, I was a little put off because my skin felt “squeaky” clean as I was washing it off. This feeling went away quickly (as soon as I dried my face with a towel) and I’ve barely noticed it during subsequent washes. A little bit goes a long way and it foams pretty easily with a sprinkle of added water. My pores look smaller and my face feels smoother, with NO BREAKOUTS on my sensitive, combination, acne-prone skin!
customer_reviews.author: danaparai

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my all time favorite facial cleansers
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my all time favorite facial cleansers. Doesn’t have a heavy feeling. You only need the smallest amount to get a good lather and it’s easliy rinsed off afterwards. Plus there’s no residue left behind. Love this cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah Mroczkowski

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I tend to try Korean skin-care products because of their reputation. I also have very oily skin. This products does foam up well and it feels like it gives you a nice good clean. It can feel a little drying, but on my face, I'm ok with that. The smell is just ok. Nothing great.
customer_reviews.author: Domenica G. Stone

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best products for me (I have oily/combo skin)
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products for me (I have oily/combo skin). I have tried many Korean face cleansers, but this product seems to make my skin feel really great after washing--like it doesn't leave my skin feeling like I didn't scrub the oil off my face hard enough. I would recommend this product for cleanser fanatics. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite facewash
customer_reviews.text: My favorite face wash! I have very large pores and oily skin. This does its job on getting rid of enough oils and making my pores smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Pachi Her

customer_reviews.title: High pH
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and silky, but it is high on the pH scale and seemed to dry out my combination skin a lot. I'll use it as a a back-up, however, because I could combat the dryness with other products. Definitely helped clear up some acne, but I used it as the second step of the double-cleanse routine.
customer_reviews.author: Leeannnna

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and feels good on skin but saw NO difference in my skin. It’s not Worth the insanely high price to see no difference so I’m going back to my old drug store cream cleanser
customer_reviews.author: B. Torrence

customer_reviews.title: Soft and best
customer_reviews.text: I like to use skinfood brand. My skin is really sensitive this washer is so soft and work so well in my skin. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Enkhzaya khadbaatar

customer_reviews.title: Decent product but drying
customer_reviews.text: Definitely feel clean after using this product, and I love how it feels as it foams on the skin. Very drying though, so I've taken to using aquaphor afterward to keep my skin from drying out on my cheekbones, forehead, and nose.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepy Fox Writes

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: This is favorite face wash! I recommend it to everyone. All my friends love it, including my husband. It doesn’t leave my face dry, consistency feels amazing, and smells great. You don’t need to use much per face wash, so it lasts forever. I’ve used this product for over a year now and still haven’t found anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Cis

customer_reviews.title: Just wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it makes my skin feel. This has helped tremendously on managing my oily skin. Great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love Korean skin products. I will say, this isn't a 100% fix, as I think you also need the Korean diet for amazing skin. However, this leaves me feeling refreshed and is a great scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is AMAZING! I have pretty good skin and am in ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I have pretty good skin and am in my late 20's, and I try a ton of different skin care items. This was one of my first Asian beauty purchases, and I will definitely re-buy. My pores look smaller, and this makes my face feel so clean, it's very foamy. I use this with my Clarisonic, and use a cleansing oil beforehand to remove all makeup. For the price, it's better than a lot of high-end cleansers I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product for those with bigger pores. Face feels refreshed afterwards and finishing with a daily facial moisturizer is like getting a facial in a spa.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: leaves my skin super dry and irritated
customer_reviews.text: Really strips your pores. A bit too much actually, leaves my skin super dry and irritated.
customer_reviews.author: shizzle

customer_reviews.title: My face feels refreshed after I use it and it's not super drying. Very subtle scent which is nice
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. My face feels refreshed after I use it and it's not super drying. Very subtle scent which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: KLW

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin soft!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash! It leaves a weird feeling on my skin but after I dry my face my skin is so softtttt. My boyfriend even likes using it now and he's used to washing his face just with his shampoo. He said it also leaves his skin feeling soft.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Just do it
customer_reviews.text: Okay but This made my skin feel so good! Tight and clean and it smells amazing. Maybe not for someone who has super sensitive skin but mines almost as sensitive as they come and it feels great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is super foamy. It helps my skin with my hormonal breakouts. Very good facial wash.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this product. I have very oily skin. I’ve literally tried thousands of dollars worth of products over the years; cleansers and masks have not worked even half as well as promised. Same thing with make up. This product is absolutely amazing! I would have to use blotting papers or powder at least ten times a day. Results of this product are immediate! I now use blotting papers a couple times a day and only apply powder once in the morning. I’m so impressed that I’ve ordered a few more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: D. B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT. I have used this my daily skin care routine for about 1.5 years and have to say this is my favorite foam cleanser. After using it, my face feels refreshed, clean, and smooth. I have dry skin with some hyperpigmentation and get occasional break out. After using this cleanser, I noticed a decrease in the number of break outs and a brightening of my skin complexion. I've also noticed that my skin doesn't get as oily as quickly as it use to. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lelee

customer_reviews.title: Great Foam Wash
customer_reviews.text: After using a sample I became hooked on this foam cleanser. It makes my skin feel clean and firm. Doesn't dry it out either. I use BB cream everyday and it seems to clean that well. Do NOT buy from University101 (seller name)! Although they offer the lowest price, the product was very old. The foam wasn't soft, it was literally solid from being so old.
customer_reviews.author: GraceTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: functional
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! At first, use your skin will react and have a noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M.

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL SKIN
customer_reviews.text: YOUR SKIN FEELS LIKE SILK THE MORE YOU USE IT. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO MAINTAIN A FLAWLESS COMPLEXION!
customer_reviews.author: MARY TORELLO

customer_reviews.title: Very good for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite Korean beauty products. For sensitive skin, it's hard to top. I've introduced it to my tween daughters who are interested in starting a solid skincare regime to keep their skin healthy.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: It smells nice and my pores are closing I like it but I wish it was alittle cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: April N.

customer_reviews.title: Just started so far feels great
customer_reviews.text: So far its a perfect size bottle your face feels really clean and not over dried I do see my pores still but I do notice little change and its been 3 4 days
customer_reviews.author: kristina baez

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: A creamy cleanser that really cleans and softens my akin!
customer_reviews.author: Happy&Grateful

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. I use it in the shower and it cleanses and tightens my face. Such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Cleans without drying
customer_reviews.text: I use this cleanser every morning and it always leaves my skin feeling clean and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Oily Face
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my greasy oily face. This stuff thus far has proven to be the best at "degreasing" my face and keeping it that way. Very good on the skin and gets rid of the oil.
customer_reviews.author: MKMCHO

customer_reviews.title: but my sister has and she's really liked it so far
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using this for very long, but my sister has and she's really liked it so far. For the few times I have used it, I really like the soapy feel; my face feels really clean afterwards, and it doesn't seem to dry my skin out either. Some people complained about the smell, but it's not a strong smell, so I don't have an issue with that.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Burned but works!
customer_reviews.text: It burned a little on my open pores, but the next day my skin was literally glowing and my acne had shrunk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong smelling
customer_reviews.text: The smell is too strong for me, and it leaves “rubber-like” feeling on my skin after using.
customer_reviews.author: Meechan

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite soap I really feel like it cleans out my pores soooo good and you only need a tiny bit of soap and then when you start rubbing it together it gets kinda like foamy and really makes my face feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Reduce pore size
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stuff. It goes on so smoothly and feels so silky. It also does work to reduce pore size. I have HUGE pores, and it really works to shrink them. I usually use it every two or three days and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my second tube and I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is my second tube and I love this stuff. My skin feels so clean and gets all my makeup off easily.
customer_reviews.author: LRN

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! You only need a little to create a good lather and my pores are definitely a lot less noticeable. Will definitely keep in my routine.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Soft skin
customer_reviews.text: This had a really great lather and left my skin feeling very soft. I usually stick to oils for cleansing but I followed it up with this and loved the results!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: It came wrapped and unopened but it did have a crack on the top where product was able to leak out. The scent is amazing! And makes my skin feel really clean and clear. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mylene Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Returning customer
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bottle, needless to say, I love this face wash! Does exactly what it says and keeps my face clean and pimple free.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Situationally Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is great for people who don't like the oily feeling on their skin (like me). I absolutely love this product, but without a good follow up skincare routine it might dry your skin out.
customer_reviews.author: Skyla Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product does everything it says and more! My pores looked better instantly. Smooth, tight, but still moisturized skin! And the amazing smell is bonus!
customer_reviews.author: kreino1

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent, cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice on the skin, lathers well. The smell is a bit perfume-y if you're sensitive to that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Hands down the BEST face wash I have ever used. I have dry, sensitive skin that's prone to break-outs - this is the only product I've ever used that cleans deep without harming my skin. I use it to wash off my make-up (eyeliner included). Perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear make up and I love the way this wash leaves my face. gives me a glow and your face feels very clean after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New HG
customer_reviews.text: This is my new HOLY GRAIL face wash. So creamy and foamy, cleanses super well, and truly does help with overproduction of oil. I will be buying it again and again. I expected it to smell weird but it doesn't. FYI I think it lathers better when applied to dry skin first, and then adding in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product. I have had oily skin and huge pores since I had skin. This stuff, after 1 application reduced my pores and the oil slick that was my face. I am a life-long customer.
customer_reviews.author: DLB

customer_reviews.title: Great wash that minimizes pores
customer_reviews.text: This product is a staple in my face washing routine. Really makes my pores small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Skinfood Egg White Pore Foam, 5.07 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:Pore FoamA refreshing foaming cleanser that washes away dirt and oil thoroughly with a white foam, leaving pores clean.
feature_bullets: A dedicated pore-refining line with egg white that tightens enlarged pores and smooths fine lines for a smoother, firmer complexion.
Albumen, commonly known as egg whites, is one of nature's highest quality protein sources.
It's also packed with niacin (Vitamin B3), riboflavin (Vitamin B2), selenium, magnesium, calcium, phosphorus, and potassium, and a complete amino acid profile.
Egg white is an excellent cleanser for congested skin as it deeply penetrates pores, removing pore-clogging oil and dead skin cells along with blackheads.
Egg white stimulates the growth of collagen cells, improving the skin's elasticity and resilience.
